titleStmt.title: Resolved upon the question by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament that all and every the ministers throughout the kingdoms of England and Ireland, Dominion of Wales, and town of Berwick upon Twede, do and are hereby required and enjoyned in their publick prayers to pray for the Kings Most Excellent Majestie
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Husbands and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first five lines of text.
At head of title: Wednesday May 9 1660.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
This item appears at reel 1550:21 as Wing E2320 and at reel 1738:24 as Wing E2264A (both numbers cancelled in Wing 2nd ed., v.1 rev., and item assigned number E2265C).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
